messages.content: 9-1-1, what's your emergency?
Listen here. I'm at Main Street in Colorado Springs, Colorado.
I'm not showing that as a valid address. Can you verify that for me?
Main Street. That is the address.
What is the nearest intersection that you're by?
What do you want, the phone number?
Okay, go ahead and give that to me.
Okay, is that a home phone?
Yes, it is.
Okay, sir. What's going on there?
I've got two people here held hostage.
Okay. You know what happens to people that are held hostage? It's not like in the movies. Do you understand that?
One of them is named Danielle and her father. I'm doing this because her father raped my sister.
Okay.
I am armed. I have a pistol, and I swear I will kill everyone if any cops come in here with guns. Do you understand me?
Can I get your name, sir?
Yes, my name is John Defano.
John, are you in the town of Security?
Yes, I am.
Okay, I'm going to transfer you to the sheriff's office. Will you stay on the phone with me?
Yes, I will.
Hang on just one second.
Can you stay on the line with me? I'm not talking to these people anymore.
Sure, John. I'll stay on the line with you. Hang on a second.
Just remember, I am armed and I will shoot.
What kind of gun do you have?
I have a .22 pistol.
And you have two people there?
Yes, an 18-year-old and her father. They're duct-taped and tied up in the next room.
Okay, let me get you over to the county. I'll stay on the phone with you, John.
All right.
John, you're still there?
Yes, I'm still here.
I have the county on the phone with us now.
Hi, okay, this is Jennifer. What exactly is going on?
I'm not talking anymore.
Is it okay if I tell her what's going on, John?
Yes, you may.

He advised me that he has two people there that he's holding hostage. An 18-year-old named Danielle and her father. He has them duct-taped in another room. He is armed with a .22 pistol and has said he will shoot if any officers enter the residence.
I will shoot. I'm not afraid. I will shoot, and then I will kill myself because I don't care, okay? Do you understand?
John, I understand. Can you spell your last name for us?
D-E-F-A-N-O.
Are you injured or are they injured?
The father has a wound.
Did you accidentally shoot him?
No. I hit him with the barrel of the gun.
Is he severely injured?
He's bleeding profusely. I need some help here because I'm going psycho right now.
What can I do to help him right now?
If I'm going to jail, I'm going to kill myself and them. I'm not going anywhere.
Why are you doing this?
I'm not talking anymore. You have the address. You have everything.
Will you just stay on the line with me?
I'm hanging up now.
John, this is Crystal. I'm still on the phone. Will you be willing to talk to me?
I'm hanging up now.
You're not willing to stay on the phone with us?
No, I'm not.
You can't tell us more about why this happened tonight?
Raping a family member is not acceptable, all right?
I understand.
I will shoot them if I don't have help here now in the next five minutes. I swear to God, I'll shoot them. Do you understand?
Yes, but it's not going to help the situation if you hang up.
I'm hanging up the phone. Do you understand?
I hear you. I'd rather you didn't.
You want somebody killed?
No, I don't.
Then shut your mouth and do your job.
